info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 12:03AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Joseph, northeastern La Porte and southeastern Berrien Counties through 1245 AM EDT/1145 PM CDT/... At 1203 AM EDT/1103 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Three Oaks, or 10 miles north of La Porte, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... New Carlisle around 1215 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Buchanan, Berrien Springs and Niles. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 47 and 70. Interstate 94 in Indiana between mile markers 41 and 45. Interstate 94 in Michigan between mile markers 0 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
